summary: This bill, the Fair Sharing of Highways and Roads for Electric Vehicles Act of 2025 (Fair SHARE Act), proposes a tax on the sale of electric vehicles and their batteries. Specifically, it imposes a $550 tax on battery modules exceeding 1,000 pounds and a $1,000 tax on each electric vehicle sold by manufacturers, producers, or importers. Revenue generated from this tax will be transferred to the Highway Trust Fund. The amendments are to apply to sales after December 31, 2025.
